content:
Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "compass", "quantity": 29, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 31}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 20, "index": 38}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a soul torch, I first need to craft some sticks. To craft sticks, I need to place any planks in the middle column of the crafting grid, and then place any other planks on either side of them. The warped planks in slot 16 are the only planks in my inventory, so I will move them to the middle column of the crafting grid (slot 5).
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 29, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 31}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 20, "index": 38}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 45}]
thought: After crafting the jungle planks, I will move them to an empty slot in the inventory (eg., slot 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 29, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 31}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 20, "index": 38}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a soul torch, I first need to craft sticks. Sticks require either bamboo or any wood planks, and I have jungle planks in my inventory. Therefore I will move one jungle plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 29, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 31}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 20, "index": 38}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I've moved one jungle plank into the crafting grid, I need to move another adjacent to it to make the sticks. Therefore I will move another jungle plank from slot 11 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 29, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 31}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 20, "index": 38}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I've crafted the sticks, I need to move them to a free inventory slot so I can use them to craft the soul torch. Therefore I will move all 4 sticks from slot 0 to slot 12.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 29, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 31}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 20, "index": 38}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a soul torch, I need to place coal in slot 1 and a stick in slot 5. There is charcoal in slot 19, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 29, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 31}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 20, "index": 38}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 45}]
thought: Next, I need to move a stick to slot 5, so I will move one of the sticks from slot 12 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 29, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 31}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 20, "index": 38}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 45}]
thought: Finally, I need to place soul sand in slot 7, so I will move the soul sand from slot 29 to slot 7.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 7 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "soul_torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 29, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "shears", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "blue_orchid", "quantity": 11, "index": 23}, {"type": "black_concrete", "quantity": 32, "index": 31}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 20, "index": 38}, {"type": "enchanting_table", "quantity": 7, "index": 40}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 57, "index": 45}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4
